description:
DearDream claimed victory at Dream Festival and won their debut. Their activities were going smoothly when the legendary idol Haruto Mikami told them, "Just because you made your debut as idols doesn`t make you idols." Later, while working at the same location as the older rival unit ACE, they have an experience that makes those words echo in their hearts. The door is about to open for them to become "true idols"!
Source: crunchyroll
